entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
